title: Bug Report | Labuladong Algo Notes
content:
Bug Report

labuladongOriginalAbout 636 words

Bug Report

labuladongOriginalAbout 636 words
labuladong labuladong labuladong Original About 636 words About 636 words

Background

As I keep updating and improving the algorithm tutorials, the website and its plugins have become richer in features, but also more complex. This can cause bugs sometimes.

So, I need your feedback to fix problems quickly and give you a better experience.

Most problems are caused by old content in your local cache. Before you report a problem, please check the list of common problems below to see if there is already a solution.

Common Problems on This Site

After buying a site subscription, solutions in the plugin are still locked?

You need to manually refresh data in the plugin to unlock the solutions. Please check the Chrome plugin guide, VSCode plugin guide, and JetBrains plugin guide for detailed steps.

Error when logging in: Only overseas IP can use GitHub/Google login

Due to network reasons, the site checks your IP when logging in. Only overseas IPs can use GitHub/Google login. Users in China should log in with WeChat.

If needed, you can link more login methods on the User Profile page.

Page is stuck or not loading?

This is usually a network issue. Overseas users or users using overseas proxies might see this sometimes.

Because the site updates often, sometimes old resources are cached in your browser or CDN, causing some pages to not load.

Solution: Try clearing your browser cache and refresh the page. If it still does not work, try using your browser's incognito mode or change your network to see if the problem is local.

If you are using a network proxy, please turn off the proxy for this site, or remove labuladong.online from the proxy rules. This should solve the problem.

Can't find results in the top right search bar?

This is usually a network problem too. The solution is the same as above.

Subscription content keeps loading but never appears?

This is usually a network problem too. The solution is the same as above.

Visualization panel is always black?

This is usually a network problem and the latest resources are not loaded. The solution is the same as above.

If you still cannot solve your problem, please report it to me.

Common Plugin Problems

Common plugin problems and solutions are in each plugin's guide: Chrome plugin guide, VSCode plugin guide, JetBrains plugin guide.

Report Problems by Email/WeChat

If you have payment, permission, or site availability issues, please contact me by email or WeChat. I will help you as soon as possible:

  • Email: [emailÂ protected]
  • WeChat: Only paid subscribers can add me. Go to the Site Subscription page to add my WeChat or join the discussion group.

Please describe your problem clearly, and include screenshots and error messages if possible. For payment or permission issues, please include your User ID and order number.

Report Problems by Github Issue

Any bugs or feature suggestions for the website and tools can be reported by opening a GitHub Issue, so other users can see and discuss them.

Click the link below to see current issues:

https://github.com/labuladong/fucking-algorithm/issues/

Click the New Issue button at the top of the Issue list to create a new Issue.

Please note:

  • GitHub Issues are public. Do NOT post any private info like user ID, order number, account password, site token/cookie, etc.
  • Before posting, search to see if anyone else has already reported the same problem or if there is a solution.

Report Problems in Article Comments

Every article on this site has a comment section at the bottom. For typos, small bugs, or non-urgent problems, you can comment there. I will check comments regularly and fix problems.
